Room Hire Information:
The new £4m Rose Hill Community Centre and gym is about to open its doors so if you are looking for a new venue come and take a look around.

Gym  

Our gym is open to all and offers great value to Rose Hill residents and beyond. 

With over thirty stations of cardio-vascular and resistance machines on offer we can also help you to tailor your very own personalised workout. 

Opening offers 

Be one of the first members to join the gym and you could save 25% off your first three months membership. Pop in for a tour or to find out more. 

Gym Memberships Membership Adult60+/Junior  Family Gym - monthly * £23.00 £15.00 £60.00 Gym - monthly   concession *# £15.00 £10.00 £40.00 Gym - monthly  corporate * £20.70 n/a £54.00 Gym - annual £253.00 £165.00  £660.00  Gym - annual  concession# £165.00 £110.00  £440.00  Gym - annual  corporate £227.70 n/a £594.00 Gym - pay & go  (card) £2.80 £2.80/£1 n/a Replacement  card £5.00 £5.00 n/a

*£1.00 additional admin fee if paid by cash

Gym Activities Activity Standard Concession#  Casual use - adult £4.20   £3.50 Casual use -  60+/Junior £3.50 £2.50  Induction - adult £10.60  £6.70  Induction - 60+/Junior £6.70 £5.30 Programme - adult £10.60 £6.70 Programme -  60+/Junior £6.70 £5.30

# concession rates available to residents with a Rose Hill postcode or residents of Oxford in receipt of means tested benefits. 

Venue Hire

We offer flexible venue hire for :

  • meetings
  • conferences
  • events
  • parties, family gatherings or celebrations
  • examinations
  • classes
  • away days

The venue also includes:

  • air conditioned rooms
  • audio visual facilities
  • wi-fi
  • photocopying facilities
  • catering and kitchen facilities
  • licensed bar

Norman Brown Halls

Two first floor halls that can be opened up to create one large area. The space benefits from a servery from the tea point.

Bill Buckingham Ball Room

On the ground floor this large flexible space boasts a spring floor, suitable for classes too. The room has access to a licensed bar and servery making it an ideal venue for parties and conferences

Break out area

Whether you just want to have a chat or an area to support workshops of conferences the first floor breakout area is light and airy.

Other activities

 Behind the new Community Centre lies Rose Hill Recreation Ground which boasts:

  • play area
  • zip wire
  • fitness trail 
  • kickabout area
  • open grass area
  • training area 

As part of the new centre new equipment and tree planting will take place. Please bar with us whilst this is completed. In the meantime please use the fitness trail or take a wander through Rivermead Nature Park - a short walk from the centre.
